name: Battle Beans: Refried
storyline: Battle Beans: Refried is a new round based third-person shooter with tons of beantastic action. Take your chance in battle bean royale or switch it up in one of the other modes such as gun game. With level progression and tons of character customization, there's always something rewarding to strive for. Voice chat adds a whole new dynamic allowing for hilarious moments and competitive banter. With more to come on the horizon, now has never been a better time to be a bean!
summary: An action packed, round-based, third-person shooter where you must embody the power of the Bean! Shoot, loot, and destroy opponents in style with a vast collection of weapons, game Modes, customization, killstreaks, and more.
